thread.section_title: Hotel Declic - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Stay
thread.title_full: Great Stay - Review of Hotel Declic, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Elle D
title: Great Stay
text: Me and my hubby went to Paris and stayed at Declic Hotel.. we arrived and staff were very accommodating they even guide you and tell you about the hotel and the places where you can visit, it is really very helpful. Breakfast was good and a lot of choices.. wifi is fast and the rooms were very stylish and all in concept. Location was very okay as well as it is just a walking distance to Montmartre and very near to the Lamarck metro station and the bus #95 so you can go whenever you wanted to go. Around the place a lot of restaurants to eat, shops and even bakeries when you wanted to buy something. We had a great time staying here thanks to Declic Hotel ‚ù§
